text: Rajiv Kapoor (25 August 1962 â€“ 9 February 2021) was an Indian actor, producer and director. His older brothers were Randhir Kapoor and the late Rishi Kapoor. ==Death== Kapoor died from a heart attack in Mumbai on 9 February 2021, at the age of 58. ==Some movies== * Zimmedaaar (1990) ... Inspector Rajiv Singh * Naag Nagin (1989) ... Kuber / Suraj * Shukriyaa (1988) ... Ajay Singh * Hum To Chale Pardes (1988) ... Ajay Mehra * Zalzala (1988) ... Bhole * Preeti (1986) * Lover Boy (1985) ... Kishan / Kanhaiya * Ram Teri Ganga Maili (1985) ... Narendra Sahay "Naren" * Zabardast (1985) ... Ravi Kumar / Tony * Lava (1985) ... Amar * Mera Saathi (1985) ... Shyam * Aasmaan (1984) ... Kumar / Chandan Singh * Ek Jaan Hain Hum (1983) ...
